messages.title: Dear Resident,
messages.content: With the 2015 General Election just weeks away, I am asking you, as your Conservative Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for Brighton Pavilion, for your vote...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Planning for economic growth through handling the UK's public finances and bringing back the economy to full strength by moving from 'rescue' to 'renewal'.
Increase employment opportunities, including creating 2,000 new apprenticeships.
Boosting the National Health Service by, amongst other measures, recruiting more GPs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Comments on potentially losing the most winnable seat in Brighton.

issues.economy: Planning for economic growth through handling the UK's public finances...
issues.health: Boosting the National Health Service by, amongst other measures, recruiting more GPs.

housing.content: More than 2,000 families have been helped onto the property ladder locally...

quotes.text: A strong economy is key to securing Britain's future.

images.caption: Clarence Mitchell - Your Conservative Candidate for Brighton Pavilion
